TEXTS.ITEM: U1&FUNCTIONALITY& ASMultithread framework root exception class. All Exception classes raised from the framework inherit from this class. Have a look to each method for more details. U1&RELATIONS& AS U1&EXAMPLE& AS U1&HINTS& AS U1&FURTHER_SOURCES_OF_INF& AS

ATTRIBUTS.ITEM: begin of NOT_A_FLAT_STRUCTURE, msgid type symsgid value 'YGPL_CX_LOCK_RELEASE', msgno type symsgno value '000', attr1 type scx_attrname value 'DATA_NAME', attr2 type scx_attrname value '', attr3 type scx_attrname value '', attr4 type scx_attrname value '', end of NOT_A_FLAT_STRUCTURE `

begin of YGPL_CX_LOCK_RELEASE, msgid type symsgid value 'YGPL_CX', msgno type symsgno value '001', attr1 type scx_attrname value 'CX_NAME', attr2 type scx_attrname value '', attr3 type scx_attrname value '', attr4 type scx_attrname value '', end of YGPL_CX_LOCK_RELEASE `
